Uccen d yinsi ikerrazen
Idjen n usekkʷas, tuɣ aṭṭaṣ n tbica. Uccen d yinsi xsen ad cerzen. Ffɣen, ẓṛen tamurt. Ẓẓan ẓṛuḍeyya. Qqimen al dd tyem, ffɣen a tt ẓṛen. Mmutren tamiṛa nsen d tameqqṛant, nnan ad qqimen al uyetca nnes ammen a tt kksen.
Ammen aykkyyen : i talya n tfuyt, kkren. Iwḍen l iyṛan. Ul ufin manec ala yyen i beṭṭu. Inna yinsi ukk uccen : "Nettc, ad isiɣ adday ; cekk, isi-y-ajenna."
Kksen ẓṛuḍeyya nsen. Insi yisi-y-adday ; iẓwa
iḍeṣṣ. Uccen yisi-y-ajenna ; yuf i day d tyuya. Iẓwa ittmenzeɣ. Inna-y-as : "Nnit ! Al tikkelt nniḍen !"
Mullu nniḍen, xsen ad cerzen imendi. Cerzen t. Ẓwan. Al idjen n wass, nnan ad mejren. Uccen, iɣill am umezwar. Iɣill ẓṛuḍeyya am imendi. Inna ikk insi :
– Assu, nettc, ad isiɣ adday ; cekk, isi-y-ajenna !
Inna-y-as yinsi : Wah a dadda ! icnu may tennid aṭṭaṣ, aṭṭaṣ !
Ffɣen l wurtan ad mejren. Insi, ikkes ajenna n imendi, iẓwa iḍeṣṣ am umezwar. Uccen, iqqim iqqaz tamurt. Yuf day call d iẓewṛan.
Iẓwa wuccen iccuccen.
Idjull ad iṭṭef insi tikkelt nniḍen.
Anday.

Tacerza n wuccen d yinsi
Ikker idjen n wass wuccen iffeɣ l yinsi inna-y-as :
Manec tennid metta necrez imendi s senn iyet neɣ ? Assu, tella tbica !
Irru xfes yinsi :
Ay uccen, ul zemmerɣ agidc cerzeɣ. Nettc d ameẓẓyan ; cekk d ameqqṛan. Manec sad neyy i beṭṭu mi nemjer ?
Hic ! maɣer tekkʷded ?
Iwa, manec ?
Ufiɣ ! Tessned manec ! Sad necrez, nemjer. Mi nesseṛweṭ, ad nebḍa.
Cekk, tellid tettjewwqed ! Manec sad neyy i beṭṭu ?
Sad neyy tamzazzart. Wenn izzaren l unṛaṛ ad yisi imendi.
Iwa manec sad yyeɣ ? Nettc, tinsa inuɣ d timeẓẓyanin ; ul zemmerɣ ad afyeɣ am cekk. Texsed ad iyi tezzared ! Cekk, day idjen n uṣurif ad tawḍeḍ anṛaṛ !
Hic ! Cekk, d ameẓẓyan, ad tzemred ad tafyed. Day ul tekkʷed ! Nettc, d ameqqṛan d amiẓay.
Ukk nekkaṛu, ffɣen, cerzen. Qqimen al ikk yiweḍ imendi, mejren t. Iwyen t l unṛaṛ, fesren t dis ammen ad iqqaṛ i tfuyt.
Yuden icnu, ẓṛen anṛaṛ ; nnan ad yyen tamzazzart l uyetca nnes, mi dd tenqeṛ tfuyt.
Ẓwan l tidrin nsen.
D iḍ, ikker yinsi issufeɣ arra d tmeṭṭut nnes. Issers in i tmewwin tuffirin idisan n ubrid. Tameṭṭut nnes, idj it zzat anṛaṛ.
I dd tuley tfuyt, iffeɣ yinsi l wuccen ammen ad azzlen. Uzzlen. Uccen, tuɣ inna sad izzar danis ameddukel nnes d ameẓẓyan.
« Idjen, senn, azzel ! »
Ufyen. Uccen tuɣ iḍeṣṣ. Iɣill sad izzar. Iẓwa ammen al-d immater insi zzates.
Manec ay uccen day yudu ay dd tiwḍed ? Uccen, iɣill d insi. Netta, ul issin mmis n yinsi.
Ah, insi ittafey ! Aykk inna wuccen jaṛ as d yiman nnes. Iṭṭef abrid ittafey ujaṛ n umezwar.
Hic, mani tellid ay uccen ? D insi nniḍen aykk issiwlen.
Iwa ay insi, nniɣ a cekk djeɣ ad tazzled ; cekk d ameẓẓyan. Tuɣ yyiɣ ac ukan asul.
Afey !
Ad iyi tezzared ? Hemm... !
Iẓwa wuccen inekkeḍ abrid. Iɣill an insi illa deffres. Ikk tuɣ sad yaweḍ anṛaṛ, immuter tinsitt. Iɣill d insi. Tenna-y-as
Zzareɣ cekk, a dadda uccen ! Imendi, inuɣ !
Iẓwa wuccen iccuccen.
Idjull ad iṭṭef insi tikkelt nniḍen.
Anday.

Tuceṛḍa n wuccen d yinsi
Idjen n wass, insi tuɣ imdukul d wuccen. Xsen ad acren mala tcen : itnin, tuɣ lluẓen. Ffɣen. Mmutren idjen n uṣeṛṛaḥ (ameksa). Ucern as idjen n wufric ameqqṛan. Yisi t wuccen l tenwalt nnes. Iqqen taflewt f yinsi. Idju t i beṛṛa.
Uccen, iɣres ukk ufric. Iqqim i jaj n tenwalt nnes. Insi, iqqim iqqaṛ as si beṛṛa :
Uc i-dd wenn iteqqsen ikk lemsi !
Dej iyi xfec !
Uc i-dd wenn iccuffuten ikk lemsi !
Dej iyi xfec !
Uc i-dd wenn iẓẓinẓiṛen ikk lemsi !
Dej iyi xfec !
Uc i-dd day ilem nnes !
Aɣ ac !
Yuc as ilem n wufric. Iṭṭf i yinsi. Yisi yict teɣrit. Iyyu iman nnes d bab n wulli ; iqqim ittcat ikk ilem n wufric. Cad mikk yutu tiyti, iẓga "Ay ! Maɣer d nettc ? Ac d wenn illan i jaj n tenwalt !"
Iwa day tiyti, sent, isell wuccen. Ikkʷed. Tuɣ iɣill d aṣeṛṛaḥ. Iṛwel. S tiwdi u-lli sa dd idwel al yiḍ.
Insi, netta, yutef l tenwalt n wuccen. Iqqen taflewt, itcu ufric. Iṭṭef ilem nnes, ifeqṛ i.
Irru t id am tbuṣeyyart.
Uccen, yuḥel, idwel ad yatef l tenwalt nnes. Yuf it teqqen. Issen d insi ay dis tuɣ yutfen. Inna-y-as :
Uc i-dd wenn iteqqsen ikk lemsi !
Ammen tennid llu !
Uc i-dd wenn iccuffuten ikk lemsi !
Ammen tennid llu !
Uc i-dd wenn iẓẓinẓiṛen ikk lemsi !
Ammen tennid llu !
Uc i-dd day ilem nnes !
Aɣ ac !
Izerr as t. Uccen, tuɣ iɣill sad yaf ilem am umezwar ; saεa yuf i am tbuṣeyyaṛt.
Iẓwa wuccen iccuccen.
Idjull ad iṭṭef insi tikkelt nniḍen.
Anday.

Uccen, insi d uyṛaḍ
Idjen n wass n laẓ d tɣaṛt, ikker uyṛaḍ iffeɣ agd wuccen d yinsi ad ṭṭfen maykk ala tcen.
Ẓwan, ttafyen, ttafyen al-d awḍen iɣeẓṛan. Mmutren idjen n uɣyul. Ṭṭfen t. Qqimen i tmurt. Xsen ad as ɣersen, bḍan t.
Issekker uyṛaḍ uccen, inna-y-as:
Bḍa-y-aɣ dd, cekk ay uccen !
Ikker wuccen ibḍa-y-asen. Yuc asen, i ca-d idjen, amur nnes. Ayṛaḍ, ikker ittmenzeɣ. Inna-y-as :
Manec ! Nedwel dd d tuta ! Axemma, ul teɣṛid cay ?
Day issusem yawkan yuẓẓeḍ ɣres s waccaren nnes. Ixeṛw as alli nnes; iyr i i tmurt. Uccen, iqqujjeε.
Inna uyṛaḍ ikk insi :
Bḍa-y-aɣ dd, cekk tessned !
Ikker yinsi ibḍa ula-d netta s imuren am imezwar. Inna ukk yṛaḍ :
Aɣ ac a dadda ! Wu, i cekk ! d wu, i cekk ! atan ula-d wu, i cekk !
Inna-y-as uyṛaḍ :
Cekk, tessned ! Axemma, teɣṛid ! Mani teɣṛid ?
Nettc a dadda, ɣṛiɣ ukk xerbic dey ttwaxṛawen id walli. Ay xfes irru yinsi.
Anday.

Ikεeb d wuccen
Yict tikkelt, ikεeb d wuccen tuɣ lluẓen. Nnan ad ffɣen l yidjen n iyṛan ammen ad acren lebṣel (aẓalim). Itnin, tuɣ ssnen ayen n iyṛan. Inna yikεeb ukk uccen :
Cḥal ɣrec illan n tmusniyin ?
Qa izaffen inuɣ d timusniyin.
Nettc, tella ɣri day yict d uzgen.
Ẓwan, utfen l iyṛan. Uccen amelluẓ, ijnu i tmurt itett. Ikεeb, ca-d mikk itcu, ikker, iqqel metta yutef d uqbun n terga. Ammen, ammen al-d sellen i bab n iyṛan. Ikεeb, iṛwel d uqbun. Uccen irza ad iffeɣ d uqbun, ul izmir : tuɣ itcu-y-aṭṭaṣ. Tessuf tdist nnes.
Iwa ssufeɣ iman nnec ! Tennid qa izaffen nnec d timusniyin !
Ul zmireɣ. Ini yi-dd manec ala yyeɣ.
Tessend a dadda, nettc tella ɣri yict d uzgen, anday. Cekk, tεelmed aṭṭaṣ n tmusniyin !
Ṛeḍl i-dd may zzeg ala ffɣeɣ !
Ad ac ṛedleɣ azgen n tmusniyt. Tessned may sad teyyed ! Qqen tiṭṭawin nnec, teyyed tinsa nnec l ujenna. Mi dd yutef ukerraz ad iɣill temmud, a cekk izerr. Cekk, ṛwel !
I dd yutef bab n iyṛan, yuf uccen i tmurt issuf. Iɣill an iqqujjeε. Yisi t issufɣ i sikk iyṛan nnes.
Day iṛeẓm as yawkan ikker ittazzel al iḍeṣṣ f ukerraz. Inna-y-as uyen n urgaz :
Nnit a cekk ṭṭfeɣ ad ac ccneɣ.
Iẓwa wuccen. Ukk brid nnes, immuter idjen n urgaz tuɣ inyu taserdunt. Immuter udi n urgaz, iqqim isridul. Iyyu iman nnes iqṛed. Ikk yiweḍ zzat bab n tserdunt, inna-y-as :
Ay tɣul ac ! Ssiwḍ iyi l tenwalt inuɣ ! Lliɣ qeṛḍeɣ, ul zemmreɣ ad yureɣ.
Ukk mezwar, yuyyey urgaz. Ukk nekkaṛu, isseny i. Ẓwan, ṭṭfen abrid. Ayen n urgaz, iṭṭeṣ s uzuzen n tyuri n tserdunt. Uccen, immuter tiṭṭawin n urgaz qqnent, yuẓẓed l tεukkatin n wuddi. Ca-d mikk iftec yict, isew udi nnes, issuf it amzun tella tetcuṛ. Ul idji ula-d yict itcuṛen.
I tiweḍ tserdunt zzat tanwalt n wuccen, inna ukk rgaz :
Atan iwḍeɣ. Kker ! Nettc, sad hwiɣ.
Bedden ; ihwa wuccen. Bab n tserdunt, iṭṭef abrid l tmurt nnes d warra nnes. Yiweḍ zzat tiddart nnes. Ffɣen ɣres warra nnes. Inna-y-asen :
Kkset ayen n tεukkatin n wudi si tserdunt, tella tuḥel !
Kkren uyen n warra yyen may d asen inna baba tsen. Ca-d tenn fetcen tneffeṛ xef sen. Qa tcuṛent s waḍu.
Man ayu a baba ?
Manec ?
Tiweyd aɣ dd udi niɣ aḍu ?
Ah ! D uccen n ubrid aykk iyyen tiyti-yu ! Ssɣed a taserdunt ! Afey, zzirref yam al zzat tanwalt dey neṛẓem ukk uccen. Ṣṛeε din ! Awey dd uccen idder niɣ a cemm nɣeɣ !
Teẓwa tserdunt al tma ɣer tt yuzen bab nnes. Teṣreε din. Teyyu iman nnes temmut.
Teqqim ammen al dd teffeɣ tuccent si tenwalt nnes. Teqqel dis ; tenna ukk uccen :
Tella tesbilliw tserdunt ! <sup>1</sup>
Inna-y-as :
Hic ! Tella temmut. Asses tajlalt inuɣ d tenn nnes a tt ssufɣeɣ l beṛṛa !
Tuɣ as awal tmeṭṭut nnes. Ikk tusses tijulal nsen, tekker tserdunt tbedd. Teṛwel zzis l bab nnes. Tuccent, teqqes d imeṭṭawen al teqqaṛ : "Nettc, qqaṛɣ ac tella tesbilliw ; cekk teqqaṛḍ i-dd ul telli tesbilliw !" <sup>2</sup>
Teṭṭef tserdunt abrid. Ca-d mi tufey afuḥ teẓẓeṛmeḍ f wuccen. Netta, ca-d mikk yuɣ tiyti, yini "Allah" al-d awḍen l tiddart n urgaz. Ikker ifetc asen tissast nsen. Iṭṭef uccen, inna-y-as :
Ha maɣer qa s tṣebḥi gidec yyiɣ, cekk, tucerd iyi ?
Icekkl i, yisi dd axedmi, iẓemḍ i. Inekḍ as qaε ilem nnes. Iqqim issekfus as tisent d tfelfelt. Ikk yuḥel, issekker taserdunt a t tessiweḍ l tenwalt nnes. Tisi t tserdunt, teẓwa ṭṭabadeg, ṭṭabadeg, al tenwalt n wuccen. Tṛeẓm as. Nettat tedwel l id bab nnes. Uccen, iqqim ittwezwez al itteṛqiqif.
Ffɣen warra nnes. Ufen t ammen. Ssitfen t l jaj n tenwalt ; ɣillen an baba tsen tuɣ iqṛef. Kkren yyn as imuɣad ammen ad izzi. Netta, ikk izzi, iqqim ississiy ayen n wudi iswu ukk mezwar. Arra nnes, mmutren udi, kkren tellɣen t al ssehruruyen. Yuden iqquṛ ɣeẓẓen t.
Anday.

<sup>2</sup> Réplique dite en berbère truffé d’ arabe dans la version orale.

Aɣerda d tɣerdayt
Recueilli par Mehmoud Aleḥyan.
Ikker uɣerda d tɣerdayt, idjen n wass, yyen amecli nsen ikk lemsi, ffɣen : aɣerda ad izdem, taɣerdayt ad tessired. Nnan wi zzaren l tiddart ad imḍey amecli, issexsey lεafit.
Aɣerda, deɣya izdem. Idwel l tiddart nnes. Iṛẓem taqbuct ad imḍey, tuḍa-y-as dis tcacit nnes. Yuẓẓeḍ s uɣenja a tt yisi, yuḍa-y-as. Issitef fus nnes ad irza-y-aɣenja, iqqim din ufus nnes. Inna a dd yisi fus nnes saεa yuḍa din qaε netta.
I tedwel tɣerdayt l tiddart nnes ul tufi-y-aɣerda. Tenna " Axemma ad yili izeddem !" Tekker ad temḍey ula-d nettat. Tuf amecli nnes icnu, tessexsey xfes. Teqqim tettṛaεa metta yus dd urgaz nnes. Iwa tuḥel i tmeṛεiwt, tuc i tnujiwin nnes ad tcent. Tcent. Tuc asent aysum. I teqqel ukk adday n teqbuct nnes, temmuter dis tcacit d uḍaṛ n uɣerda. Tenna i tnujiwin nnes :
Rremt i-dd aysum n uɣerda inuɣ !
Iwa rrent as, day yict twessart tuɣ tetcu amur nnes. Tenna-y-as :
A lalla ! Nettc tciɣ t. Metta ad am uceɣ afuḥ sukk ḍaṛ inuɣ...
Teqqel tɣerdayt maykk ala teyy ammen ad tessekker aɣerda nnes. Teffeɣ l teymart tenna-y-as :
A taεεa, a taεεa !
Uc i-dd idjen n uzaff ! A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Tenna-y-as teymart :
Awy i-dd aylas ad am uceɣ zaff !
Tiweḍ l uyemmun tenna-y-as :
A yemmun, a yemmun ! Uc i-dd aylas, aylas !
A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Inna-y-as uyemmun :
Awy idd aman ad am uceɣ aylas !
Tezzirref l yiɣẓeṛ tenna-y-as :
A yiɣẓeṛ, a yiɣẓeṛ !
Uc i-dd vva, vva !
A t uceɣ i yemmun, i yemmun ! Ad i-dd yuc aylas, aylas !
A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Inna-y-as yiɣẓeṛ :
Awy i-dd tiwacunin ad i-dd ṛekḍent !
Teẓṛu tiwacunin, tenna-y-asent :
A tiwacunin, tiwacunin ! Rwaḥemt ṛekḍemt ikk iɣẓeṛ ! Ad i-dd yuc aman !
A ten uceɣ i yemmun ! Ad i-dd yuc aylas, aylas ! A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Nnant as twacunin :
Awy aɣ dd tarkasin ad am neṛked !
Teqqel l uxerraz tenna-y-as :
Axerraz, axerraz !
Uc i-dd tarkasin, tarkasin ! A tent uceɣ i twacunin !
Ad ṛekdent ikk iɣẓeṛ ! Ad i-dd yuc aman !
A ten uceɣ i yemmun ! Ad i-dd yuc aylas, aylas ! A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Inna-y-as :
Awy i-dd idjen n uydi ! Tessiwel d uydi, tenna-y-as :
Ay aydi, ay aydi ! Uc i-dd idjen n ugzin ! A t uceɣ ukk xerraz ! Ad i-dd yuc tarkasin !
A tent uceɣ i twacunin ! Ad rekḍent ikk iɣẓeṛ ! Ad i-dd yuc aman !
A ten uceɣ i yemmun ! Ad i-dd yuc aylas, aylas !
A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Inna-y-as :
Awy i-dd utcu !
Temmuter yict tmeṭṭut, tenna-y-as :
–A tameṭṭut, tameṭṭut ! Uc i-dd utcu, utcu !
A t uceɣ ukk ydi ! Ad i-dd yuc agzin ! A t uceɣ ukk xerraz !
Ad i-dd yuc tarkasin ! A tent uceɣ i twacunin ! Ad ṛekḍent ikk iɣẓeṛ ! Ad i-dd yuc aman !
A ten uceɣ i yemmun ! Ad i-dd yuc aylas, aylas ! A t uceɣ i taεεa, i taεεa ! Ad i-dd tuc zaff !
A zzis iniɣ argaz inuɣ !
Tuc as tmeṭṭut utcu. Tuc i ukk ydi. Yuc as agzin ; tuc i ukk xerraz. Yuc as tarkasin, tuc int i twacunin. Ṛekḍent ikk iɣẓeṛ. Yuc as aman, tiwy in ukk yemmun. Yuc as aylas. Tiwy i i teymart. Tenna-y-as :
Iwa, kkes zaff !
Tekkes zaff si tejlalt nnes. Taymart, tuɣ ttett aylas. Iwa teqqim day ttekkes izaffen. Taymart, tenna-y-as :
–Awd cemm !
Taɣerdayt, teqqim day ttekkes. Iwa qa may dd tiwey teymart tinez ttett aylas, taɣerdayt tella ttekkes i d izaffen. Ttekkes, ttekkes, al-d as dd terru tajlalt nnes d taqellalt. Tekker teymart ttmenzeɣ yawka tṛetx it : temmut.
Anday.

Taɣerdayt tajellitt
Idjen n wass, yict tɣerdayt txes ad tẓeṛ beṛṛa d midden ; teffeɣ sukk qbun nnes.
Tebheḍ ukk jenna-y-aziza d yiwdan. Tsell ukk yaẓiḍ itedden. Tenna-y-as :
Manswen cekk ?
Mm ! Nettc, d ajellid Yaẓiḍ ! Qqel ikk id jujju inuɣ manec yyen ! ay xfes irru uyaẓiḍ.
Day issusem yawkan yus dd ɣres idjen n urgaz iɣers as, issenw i. Teqqim tɣerdayt tḍeṣṣ al teqqaṛ :
Nettc, ifeɣ ajellid. Ad yureɣ manec xseɣ, ul tekkʷdeɣ. Qa ifeɣ midden !
Tutef l tiddart n idjen n urgaz, teqqim ttett as imendi nnes. Ikk tetcuṛ tadist nnes, teqqim
tṛekked al dd yas umucc ̣itc it.
Ameqqṛan, ul iqqiṛ netta d ameqqṛan.
Anday.

At ukeṛkeṛ
At ukeṛkeṛ d iwdan ul tuɣ nessin aṛeṭṭal. Wi di sen ul neεlim maykk ala itec, iqqaṛ i ikk at tmurt nnes mukud isek takeṛkaṛt iyer dd xfes adlas, ikkeṛkeṛ.
Iwa qqimen ammen aṭṭaṣ n wussan.
Sent twacunin, tuɣ mdukulent. Ca-d ass tuɣ kkurent a dd ayment aman. Itninti, tuɣ msexsant qbala. Idjen n umullu yict sukk uyen n tbeẓẓiwin, teḍεen f tmeddukelt nnes am ḍaṛi. Tuf it till.
May cemm yuɣen ?
Ul zemmreɣ a gidem ffɣeɣ !
Maɣer ?
Sad nekkeṛkeṛ ! Necni, ul nufi maykk ala ntec ! Llan ssnen zzis midden.
Ul tekkʷed ! Rεa da !
Teẓwa uyen n tewtemt l tiddart nnes. Tisi dd imendi ; tiwy as t. Ayen n wass uyment
dd. L uyetca nnes, ikk mmutren midden babas n uyen twacunt idder, behḍen. Ssetnen t. Ufen d aṛeṭṭal ay zzeg qqimen at tiddart nnes ddren.
Day yuden aykk ssnen midden aṛeṭṭal.<sup>3</sup> Anday.

<sup>3</sup> Dans certaines versions, on dit que les deux filles se sont déplacées de Aghlal (nord de Figuig) vers Mélias (sud-ouest) pour diffuser leur nouvelle découverte : la solidarité. Dans ces deux régions, on peut toujours voir des tumuli et des gravures attribués à At Oukerker.

Awessar d imendi
Ḍaṛi, mikk imɣeṛ niɣ iwser cṛa-n yiwden, ittwanɣa. D mmis ay t issufuɣen l uḍṛaṛ. Yittsi t ukk zgaw, mukud yawy i al tqiccewt n uḍṛaṛ ; iṛeẓm as ssyin, iẓwa. Babas, ittɣima din ad immet.
Idjen n umullu, ikker idjen n uqeyyar ad issufeɣ babas. Yisi t. Ikk iwḍen zzat aḍṛaṛ, iqqim iḍeṣṣ uyen n uwessar. Mmis, ibbexnuneḍ : "Manec ! Nettc sad nɣeɣ baba, netta, illa iḍeṣṣ !"
Maɣer tḍeṣṣed a baba ? Nettc, sa cekk nɣeɣ ; cekk, tellidtḍeṣṣed ?
Ih, a mmi ! Lliɣ ḍeṣṣeɣ xfec. Ammu aykk yyiɣ i baba. Cekk, tellid ttekked ammu i babac. Mmic sad ac iyy ula-d netta-y-ammu.
Manec ?
Wah, a mmi ! D ammu aykk illan. Assu d nettc, ayetca d cekk.
Iqqes mmis d imeṭṭawen. Yill al-d yaḥel. Ikkes babas sukk zgaw. Yiwy i l idjen n uqbun uṣbiḥ. Icn as may deg ala iqqim d may deg ala izdeɣ. Iẓwa uyen n umeẓẓyan.
Cṛa-d ass, tuɣ ittawy as maykk ala itec d maykk ala isew s tufra danis ikkʷed d ul tessnen warra n tmurt nnes maykk iyyu. Metta ssnen, an iffeɣ abrid : a t nɣen.
Ẓwan wussan, usen dd wussan. Iqqim ammen al idjen n usekkʷas teqquṛ tmurt n uyen yiwdan. Tbica, ul tuɣi. Tiẓnin, ṛɣent. Qqimen i laẓ d fad.
Yus dd usekkʷas nniḍen. Tuɣ tbica. Uzzlen iɣeẓṛan. Tamurt, teqqim d tawṛaɣt : lid d aylas, lid d tizzizewt. Xsen midden ad cerzen, ul ufin imendi. Ayn uqeyyar, ul yufi ula-d maykk ala yawey i babas. Iffeɣ idjen n wass ; yuley aḍṛaṛ ad iẓṛ awessar nnes. Yiweḍ zzates, inna-y-as, d imeṭṭawen tcuṛen tiṭṭawin nnes :
Baba ! Tbica, tuɣ. Midden xsen ad cerzen, ul ufin imendi. Nella nekkʷed i laẓ.
Nettc ul ufiɣ maykk ala tetced. Inna-y-as babas :
A mmi, sad tezzirrfed al uɣṛem aqbur mani yi tuɣ teẓẓaṛed ; ɣez din ad tafed imendi. An d mani t tuɣ nteffer.
Iẓwa mmis ittafey al-d yaweḍ. Iɣzu tamurt, yuf imendi. Yisi t. Issiwḍ i ikk at tmurt nnes. Kkren midden cerzen. Ayen n uqeyyar, ul itti babas. Cṛa-d ass, tuɣ ittawy as may zzeg ala isellek maxef meddjren.
Imendi, ikker ; urtan, zzizwen. Tedwel dd tmurt n uyen n yiwdan am umezwar. Mejren midden, sṛewten. Kksen aṭṭaṣ n imendi. Tamiṛa nsen, teffeɣ dd d tameqqṛant. Kksen maykk ul kkisen si tella tmurt nsen.
Yict tikkellt, nnan imezdaɣ n uyen n uɣṛem ad yyen tameɣṛa tameqqṛant ukk qeyyar ten issufɣen si laẓ. Nnan as t. Ixes. Ukk mezwar, sstnen t f manec iyyu al-d yaf imendi. Inna-y-asen :
Ad awim iniɣ, metta ad iyi tedjem ddreɣ.
Nnan as :
Manec ! Cekk, tessufeɣd anaɣ si laẓ d ukeṛker, necni a cekk nneɣ ! Siwel ! Ul tekkʷed ! May texsed, ad ac t neyy.
Issiwel. Inna-y-asen qa maykk iyyu d babas. Ẓwan uyen n yiwdan l uḍṛaṛ. Ssehwan dd ayen n uwessar; yyn-as tameɣṛa taqeṛḍalt. Day yuden aykk ssnen man ayen awessar. Sukk uden, llan ḥerrzen wi wesren.
Anday.

Tayujilt
Ikker urgaz d tmeṭṭut reclen. Uṛwen yict tewtemt. Sseymen tt. Ikk tiweḍ mraw (εecṛa) n isekkʷasen, temmut yemmas. Ppas, ircel d tmeṭṭut nniḍen. Teqqim tettemḥewt i tmeṭṭut n babas amzun d tayya nnes.
Idjen n umullu, teffeɣ d babas l yiɣẓeṛ ammen ad ṭṭfen iselman. Ṭṭefn aṭṭaṣ n iselman.
Nnan ad dewlen l tiddart nsen.
Tekker tyujilt ad teẓwa ; inna-y-as babas :
Aɣ (ax) am tazgawt ! Ssiwḍ it l tiddart ! Zzar ! Yuc as iselman a ten tisi. Netta, iqqim din.
Tisi tazgawt n iselman agd idjen n uslem ameqqṛan ukk fus ; teẓwa. Ukk brid, tessiwel agid’es yict tjenneyt.
Uc i-dd ayen n uslem !
Ul zemmreɣ, kkʷdeɣ i baba d tmeṭṭut nnes.
Ul tekkʷed ! A cemm ḥerzeɣ !
Tuc as t, teẓwa l tiddart n babas. Yuden ikk yutef ppas l tiddart nnes, ul yufi-y-aslem ameqqṛan. Inna i yellis :
Mani t teyrid ?
Tenna-y-as :
Tuɣ kkureɣ, inekkez si tezgawt iṛwel l yiɣẓeṛ. Iṭṭf it babas, yut it al-d yaḥel. Iqqn it i tzeqqa. Teqqim din. Mi terza ad ttec, tettitc as tmeṭṭut n ppas day yaluz metta ilzen cṛa. Ayen n tjenneyt, tuɣ tettawy as cṛa-d ass utcu uṣbiḥ. Senn n isekkʷasen, tella i tẓeqqa tettwaqqen.
Idjen n wass, teymu yellis n uyen n tmeṭṭut. Ajellid n tmurt nsen, ixes ad ircel i mmis ; yuzen ticemjin nnes ad as rzant tameṭṭut tunjirt.
Ffɣent si tiddart l tiddart al-d awḍent zzat tiddart n tyujilt. Squbeqbent ; teffeɣ ɣer sent tmeṭṭut n babas n tyujilt. Ssetnent tett metta teεlem cṛa-n tqeyyart yiwḍen rrcel. Teccn asent yellis. Nnant as metta teεlem tenn nniḍen. Ul ɣisent tamezwart. Tenna-y-asent : - Anday εelmeɣ.
I tuɣ ssawalent, tuɣ tettsella-y-asent tjenneyt. Ikk ssussment, teẓga-y-asent :
Lliɣ da ! Utfent ɣres, ssufɣent tett si tzeqqa deg tuɣ tettwaqqen. Ufent tett tif tziri.
Isint tett l tiddart n ujellid. Immutr it, ixs it ; ikker irza tt l babas. Yuc as tt.
I dd tuɣ iqqim wass i rrcel n ujellid, yuzn as i tyujilt tixsayin l tiddart n ppas. Tameṭṭut n babas n tyujilt, teṭṭef tixsayin ; tessiṛed yellis. Tedju tayujilt. Tuzen yellis ukk jellid. Tayujilt, teqqim i tiddart n babas till al tekkar imeṭṭawen al dd tedwel d tatbirt tamellalt. Tefferfer al mani iṣerreḥ ujellid ileɣman nnes. Teqqim tessehruruy idjen n usehrurey inekkeḍ ulawen. Ileɣman bedden. Ul zmiren ad tcen, qqimen illen.
Aṣeṛṛaḥ, immuter ileɣman illen d tetbirt tessehruruy, iẓwa l ujellid, inna-y-as maykk illan.
Iffeɣ ujellid d irgazen nnes ad rzan tatbirt tamellalt. Mdeyn as i tezdayt deg tettbedda. Ussan, tbedd tetbirt f ujenna n tezdayt am ḍaṛi. Teṭṭf it tmeddayt. Ul tezmir ad teṛwel. Yisi tt ujellid.
Tameṭṭut nnes tugez manessen tatbirt tamellalt : d wetnas tayujilt.
Ikk iffeɣ urgaz nnes, teṭṭef wetnas, tɣers as, tesseṛɣ it. Teffeɣ tzerr iɣed nnes ukk urtan. Ayen n yiɣed, yuḍa f cṛa n tbuxxatin.
Idwel ujellid l tiddart nnes. Yuf tatbirt ul telli. Issten tameṭṭut nnes. Tenna-y-as :
Teṛwel llu !
Issusem.
Ẓwan wussan. Idjen n umullu, terza yict tmeṭṭut sent tbuxxatin danis mmis tuɣ yuḍen. Uznen tt midden l tmeṭṭut n ujellid. Teẓṛ it. Tenna-y-as mani deg ala taf tibuxxatin. Teḍεen i mani d as tenna. Tuf sent : yict d tameqqṛant, yict d tameẓẓyant. Tisi tent. Teẓwa.
Ikk tiweḍ tazdeɣt nnes, tuẓẓeḍ tameẓẓyant i mmis. Tameqqṛant, tenna a sett tebḍa d izegnan. Teffeɣ dd zzis yict twacunt tekkar ifadden s uqisqes d tṣebḥi. Tameṭṭut, teqqim tetterjij s tiwdi d ubhaḍ. Teẓwa, tezzirref l ujellid, tenna-y-as may temmuter. Yuzn it ad as dd tawey tawtemt tbuxxatt. Tiwy as tt. Yugez tayujilt. Teqqim, tenna-y-as qa may teẓṛu d tmeṭṭut n ppas d wetnas ; manec al dd tedwel d tatbirt, d tbuxxatt...
Issɣed ɣres ujellid. Idjull ad iɣres i tmeṭṭut n mmis, wetnas n tyujilt, yawy aysum nnes i yemmas. Ammen aykk iyyu. Ukk nekkaru, yiwey tayujilt i mmis.
Anday.

Ayujil
Idjen n ubeẓẓiw, tuɣ izdeɣ d babas. Yemmas, temmut. Ppas, yiwey tameṭṭut nniḍen.
Ammu idjen n wass ayen n urgaz, ixes ad issew. Inna i mmis :
– Nettc sad ssweɣ ; cekk ruḥ l yiɣẓeṛ ad tzedmed iqecḍan zzeg ala nessnew. Iwa
ɣar’ec !
Iffeɣ urgaz. Mmis, yutef ukk adday n tbarda, ittṛaṛa tameṭṭut n ppas. Tuɣ issen may sad teyy. Tekker tmeṭṭut, teffeɣ, tesɣu timellalin d tyaẓiṭṭ. Tekkʷ, tḍelleε. Tessnew aɣṛum. Teffr i ukk ylim. Tessnew timellalin. Tedj int i seksu. Teccencef tyaẓiṭṭ. Tessenw it.
I tessnew amecli nnes, iffeɣ uyujil si tbarda. Ixbeḍ taflewt amani yutef dd si beṛṛa n tiddart. Idjen n ufuḥ yatef dd ppas. Irza-y-amecli. Tenna-y-as tmeṭṭut nnes :
May zzeg sad ssenweɣ amecli, niɣ s iḍaṛen inuɣ ?
Ikker itekkʷer mmis :
Mar ay aqemmum n uydi u dd tiwiyed iqecḍan ?
Rεa ad ac iniɣ a baba !
May sad i-dd tinid ay amcum ?
Rεa ukan ad ac iniɣ a baba !
Ini !
Tuɣ ffɣeɣ. Uḍan dd xfi isenfas anectin n tmellalin illan i seksu. Ameεlak ul ɣbireɣ i tɣunt anectin n teṛḍunt n uɣṛum illan ukk ylim, ad iliɣ necfeɣ am tyaẓiṭṭ illan i teqbuct.
Man ayen teqqaṛed ay aɣicum ?
Ul ssɣad l uyujil. Iyujilen d izeffanen !
Ad ac djalleɣ a ppa, day tuɣ...
Susem !
Ikker babas isxummer ukk ylim. Yaf dis taṛḍunt tenwu. Iqqel l seksu, yaf dis tyaẓiṭṭ. Inna i mmis :
Iwa, wah a mmi ; tella tettacer anaɣ !
Ikker illef i tmeṭṭut nnes ; iqqim netta d mmis ad zerden.
Anday.

Timefṛeṭṭ n yiɣed
Idjen n urgaz, ircel d yict tmeṭṭut. Uṛwen yict twacunt. Teqqim day tetteyma al dd tdekkʷel d tunjirt, d tuṣbiḥt. Tuɣ tif qa tiwetmin n uɣṛem nnes. Idjen n umullu, temmut yemmas. Teqqim d tayujilt.
Ikker ppas yiwey tameṭṭut nniḍen. Tuṛew taɣd nettat yict twacunt. Yellis d tazdatt d tulyict. Ul tessin qa i cṛa. Teymu uyen n tewtemt. Yemmas, temmuter belli tayujilt, tif it ; tusem zzis. Sukk uyen n wass, tella tessuṭuṣ it day ikk lemsi, an d may xef d as qqaṛen Timefṛett-n-Yiɣed.
Tuɣ tettazn it, tettcat it al d as tettitec day yaluz nnes. Nettat, tuɣ teεlem yict tjenneyt d as ittitcen day maykk icnen.
Tameṭṭut, temmuter Timefṛett d tuṣbiḥt tecnu, teqqn it ukk qbun. Ammen ul tettif yellis. Tuɣ tettadja tt i laẓ, fad d yinjan. Ikk tenna ad tili teqquṛ, tṛeẓm as. Ha tuf it am tziri : tif manec texleq ukk mezwar. Tɣill uyen n tmeṭṭut an d aqbun, saεa qa d tajenneyt ay dis tuɣ ittheḷḷan. Tekker teqqen yellis ukk qbun. Tuɣ tekkar as day maykk icnen metta laɣna tif Timefṛett -n-Yiɣed.
Tedj it din aṭṭaṣ n wussan. Tekker ad as teṛẓem. Day tekkes tuṭṭubt tamezwart yawkan tnekkez dd l beṛṛa. Tuf it day d ixsan. Qa teqquṛ sad temmet. Tuɣ tessikkʷid. Teqqim yemmas tṛeqq s yisam. Cṛa-d ass, tuɣ treddza may zzeg ala tesselyec Timefṛett. Ul tufi.
Qqiment ammen al idjen n wass iberreḥ ujellid ikk at tmurt nnes ad ssufɣen yessi tsen danis mmis tuɣ sad ircel. Ixs ad irza tunjirt n uyen n tmurt. Iwa qaε at uɣṛem ssiṛḍen yessi tsen. Qa tiqeyyarin, tuɣ ttqisqisent : ca-d yict may tiṛed d may tesseylulu, ticerjlin, tiwinas, ixelxalen... Timefṛett, ul teεlim yemmas d as ala nessiṛed may zzeg ala teffeɣ. Teqqim till ikk lemsi al dd ɣres tus tjenneyt. Tessusm it, tessiṛḍ as qa maykk ul εliment ula-d tijellidin.
Teffeɣ. Iḍεen mmis n ujellid. Immutr it, ibedd. Ul izmir ad iyur. Issiwel ɣres, u d as terri-y-awal. Yuẓẓeḍ l uḍaṛ nnes ad iqqel ukk xelxal ; teṛwel. Iqqim uxelxal ikk fassen n ujellid ameẓẓyan. Iẓwa l tiddart nnes. Inna i babas maykk iẓṛu. Issekker ujellid inen ala nerza Timefṛett n Yiɣed. Isin axelxal, utfen tiddart, tiddart ad rzan tenn deg dd ittas uyen n uxelxal. Ufen tt.
Ukk ass deg tuɣ sad ircel mmis n ujellid, tekker tmeṭṭut n ppas n Tmefṛett tessiṛid yellis. Tuzn it ukk sley amzun d tenn irza. D iḍ, immuter it usley. Iqqel ukk ḍaṛ nnes, yuf it tiṛed axelxal n Tmefṛett. Iqqel ukk ɣensu nnes ; yuf it d aqebqub, d tulyict qbala, qbala. Issekker ujellid irgazen nnes iwyen dd Timefṛett -n-Yiɣed. Wetnas, iɣers as ujellid, yuzn it i ccwari l tiddart n yemmas. Timefṛett, tercel d ujellid, teqqim agids.
Anday.

Aṛḍel d Uzgen n Uṛḍel
Idjen n urgaz, immut idju dd tameṭṭut d senn n warra : Aṛḍel d Uzgen n Uṛḍel. Ayen n ibeẓẓiwen, tuɣ tettren danis ul ufin maykk ala tcen.
Idjen n wass, tuɣ tettren l yict tmeṭṭut ; tenna-y-asen :
Afeyt ad teyyem maykk tuɣ itekk babatwem !
Ssetnen yemma tsen f maykk tuɣ itekk. Tuyyey ad asen tini. Kkren ssibeɣn as iḍuḍan nnes ukk ẓɣal iteqqden. Tenna-y-asen :
Baba twem, tuɣ ittacer si tiddart n ujellid !
Kkren tekken qa maykk iyyu baba tsen. Cṛa-d ass tuɣ ttacern ukk jellid. Ass amezwar, inna wuday ukk jellid :
Cidi, a cidi ! Nella nettwacar !
Rzan may zzeg ɣer sen utfen iceffaṛen ; ul ufin. Iqqel wuday i tzeqqa n ujellid, yuf. Yyen din tameddayt. L yiḍ, ittwaṭṭef uṛḍel i tmeddayt. Issten yumas :
May sad neyy ?
Ul ssineɣ a yuma.
Metta qqimeɣ da, sad nettwaṭṭef s senn iyt-neɣ. Iwa, day nekḍ i-dd ixf inuɣ !
Ikker Uzgen inekḍ as t ; iẓwa. Day iẓwa, yawkan yutef wuday l tzeqqa n ujellid ; iẓga :
Cidi, a cidi ! Neṭṭef aceffaṛ nneɣ !
Mani yella,
Ha netta !
Ha may sad neyy s wikk ul neεlim aqelqul ?
A t nessufeɣ, nayl i. Ad nberreḥ ; tameṭṭut yillen d yemmas.
Ssufɣen t, uylen t. Berrḥen ikk at uɣṛem qaε ad ffɣen. Yemmas n Uṛḍel, tekkʷed ala neffeɣ. Tessen belli sad till mi temmuter mmis. Iwa teqqel maykk ala teyy. Inna-y-as mmis ad teffeɣ, tisi iqlilen i tserdunt amani tezznuz in. Netta ad iḍεen ikk idis nnes. Iṛṛẓ in. Nettat, ad till s iqlilen nnes.
Yyen maykk nnan. Immuter it ujellid till, yuc as ad tseɣ iqlilen nniḍen ammen a t tdej ad irza s iceffaṛen nnes.
Qqlen ikk at uɣṛem ; ula-d idjen ul yill. Isin t al wass nniḍen. Ukk zgen n yiḍ, iffeɣ Uzgen-n-Uṛḍel ad yisi yumas si tiddart n ujellid. Yisi iɣayden, iyy asen ccemεat ikk qelwaε nsen.
Iεessasen n ujellid, day mmutren ammen, ṛewlen s tiwdi. Azgen ibbub yumas, iṛwel. Ikker imeḍl i, issercem qa timeḍlin. l uyetca nnes i dd tenqeṛ tfuyt, rzan iεessasen Aṛḍel ; ufen ittwayessi, ittwamḍel. Ssetnen uday f mala yyen ammen ad afen tamḍelt nnes. Inna-y-asen ad qqlen l temḍelt turcimt. Qaε timeḍlin, tuɣ recment.
Nnan ad aznen ticmejt ad terza timellalin n usid ammen ad afen wi ten yucren. Teffeɣ tettawel si tiddart l tiddart al-d taweḍ tiddart n Uzgen. Terza timellalin n usid a zzi sent teyy talbiɣt. Tuc as yemmas n Uṛḍel afuḥ i tɣellust. Yuden i teffeɣ si tiddart, immutr it Uzgen. Netta, day yuden ay tuɣ sad yatef. Issten yemmas f tmeṭṭut iffɣen si tiddart nsen. Tenna-y-as :
Day d tameṭṭut tuɣ treddza timellalin n usid.
Ha tucid as ?
Day afuḥ a mmi !
Ac tenɣid anaɣ a yemma !
Iffeɣ s tazzla. Iṭṭef ayen n tmeṭṭut, ikks as iles nnes. Nettata, teɣmu idammen i teflewt n tiddart n Uzgen. Teẓwa l ujellid ad as tini may teẓṛu. Teqqim teshemhum cṛa-n iwalen. Ul yugiz may d as tenna. Yuzn it d senn n iεessasen ad asen teccen wi teẓṛu.
Azgen, immuter idammen i teflewt nnes. Ikker iɣres ikk iɣid, iɣmu idammen qaε i tfelwin n uɣṛem nnes.
Teffeɣ tecmejt d iεessasen n ujellid ad ẓṛen mani teɣmu idammen, ufen qaε tifelwin zewɣent s idammen. Dewlen l ujellid ul ufin maykk ala yyen. Azgen, iqqim d yemmas.
Anday.

Tayemlult d Yemlul
Ikker Yemlul d Tyemlult, tuɣ εelmen tiwetmin d idjen n ubeẓẓiw. Yessi tsen, reclent ; ffɣent tamurt agd irgazen nsent.
Idjen n wass, xsen ad xeṭṛen l yessi tsen. Isin lferd n lkettan d tεukkatin n wudi. Ẓwan a tent ẓṛen. Ukk brid, ufen ajellid n tzizwa iẓẓaḍ. Yern as mmi tsen ad iɣeṛ : ɣillen d axerbic. Iqqim iẓekka al iṛekkʷel. Itnin, tuɣ terran t al qqaṛen i tzizwa :
Sseɣṛ i, a dadda ! Sseɣṛ i ! Djen t din. Ṭṭfen abrid al-d awḍen yict tmurt. Tuɣ txeṛṛeq s tɣaṛt. Itnin, ɣillen an tuɣ tḍeṣṣ asen. Yern as udi nsen.
Ẓwan, kkuren, kkuren al-d mmatren yict tenqelt ittuṛaṛ zzis waḍu. Nnan an tuɣ tennesɣa danis temmutr in. Ssiṛedn as lkettan nsen. Ẓwan.
Iwḍen l yelli tsen tamezwart. Nnan as qa maykk yyen ukk brid nsen. Yelli tsen, tuɣ tẓeṭṭ acḍif amellal. Txes ad tekker ad asen teyy amecli, tenna i yemmas :
Yer tayetti nnem l ucḍif inuɣ si cṛa n yizi ! Day teffeɣ s ufuḥ, irsu idjen n yizi ukk cḍif nnes. Tekker Tyemlult tisi-y-aziwa tettcat i al-d tessenser ayen n ucḍif. Qa tnekḍ i. I dd tedwel yellis, tenna-y-as :
Atan a yelli, tuɣ irsu dis yizi. Nɣiɣ t s uziwa ! Teqqel l ucḍif nnes. Tuf i qaε inkeḍ. Tenna-y-as :
Mar a yemma tnekkḍed acḍif inuɣ !
Teqqel Tyemlult l urgaz nnes :
–Yemlul !
Man ayen a Tayemlult ?
Kker ad neẓwa, middn-u yren anaɣ !
Ẓwan l yelli tsen tussent. Nnan as belli tuɣ iweyn as dd udi d lkettan saεa ucen ten i tmurt d tenqelt. Iwa mmuneswen ɣres. Xsen ad ṭṭṣen. Tessa-y-asen yelli tsen i tẓeqqa nṛṛẓeq. Tenna-y-asen :
Ɣar wim si cṛa-n uceffaṛ !
Tziri, tuɣ tutef l tzeqqa agd yiri. Tekker Tyemlult tettcat it al-d teṛṛeẓ qaε iqellalen n wudi n yellis. l uyetca nnes i dd kkren sikk iṭeṣ, tenna i yellis :
